code: import React from"react";import"./../public/styles.css";function Heading(){const date=new Date();const currentTime=date.getHours();let greeting;const customStyle={color:""};if(currentTime<12){greeting="Good Morning";customStyle.color="red";}else if(currentTime<18){greeting="Good Afternoon";customStyle.color="green";}else{greeting="Good Night";customStyle.color="blue";}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h1",{className:"heading",style:customStyle}," ",greeting," ");}export default Heading;
